CRANBOURNE'S BEST KEPT SECRET
Set on an incredible 2,007m2 of land, this spectacular property combines privacy with the convenience of a hidden central location just minutes to every amenity you could need or want.
The immaculate home has a country warmth right on entry and comprises: 4 bedrooms, - master with large WIR & beautifully renovated ensuite that adjoins the front lounge with cathedral ceilings, Coonara and exposed brick wall adding to the country charm.
